Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/18463740.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]

Allergy Disclaimer
19092718
PLEASE NOTE: -

Guests may consult with a chef or special diets trained Cast Member before placing an order. We use reasonable efforts in our sourcing, preparation and handling procedures to avoid the introduction of the named allergens into these menu choices. While we take steps to prevent cross-contact, we do not have separate allergy-friendly kitchens and are unable to guarantee that a menu item is completely free of allergens. Allergy-friendly offerings are reliant on supplier ingredient labels. We cannot guarantee the accuracy of the contents of each food item. Allergen advisory statements (e.g., “may contain") are not regulated and therefore not taken into consideration when developing allergy-friendly meals. It is ultimately our Guests' discretion to make an informed choice based upon their individual dietary needs.

Item.Name: Le Cellier Steakhouse
Item.Content:
Le Cellier Steakhouse in World Showcase, Epcot, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Le Cellier Steakhouse

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90001798.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Descend into the cozy cellar of a Canadian château for exquisite steaks and seafood specialties.
WDWNT says...
The Cheddar Cheese Soup is fantastic. The bread service is also really solid. For steaks, I think Le Cellier is over-priced for what you get, but I've never had a bad experience here. If you really just want a good steak take a walk to Shula's at the Dolphin.
  WDWNT recommends this!
  Short code: lece
  Cuisine: American/Steakhouse
  Details: Disney Dining Plan Accepted

19092718
PLEASE NOTE: -

Guests may consult with a chef or special diets trained Cast Member before placing an order. We use reasonable efforts in our sourcing, preparation and handling procedures to avoid the introduction of the named allergens into these menu choices. While we take steps to prevent cross-contact, we do not have separate allergy-friendly kitchens and are unable to guarantee that a menu item is completely free of allergens. Allergy-friendly offerings are reliant on supplier ingredient labels. We cannot guarantee the accuracy of the contents of each food item. Allergen advisory statements (e.g., “may contain") are not regulated and therefore not taken into consideration when developing allergy-friendly meals. It is ultimately our Guests' discretion to make an informed choice based upon their individual dietary needs.

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90001829.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]

Item.Name: Monsieur Paul
Item.Content:
Monsieur Paul in World Showcase, Epcot, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Monsieur Paul

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90001296.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Make it an evening to remember at Monsieur Paul, a gourmet restaurant in the France Pavilion where you can indulge in some inventive twists on traditional French cuisine—complemented by fine wines and breathtaking views of World Showcase. Please note that Monsieur Paul has a strict dress code. Appropriate attire for men includes khakis, slacks, jeans, dress shorts and collared shirts; appropriate attire for women includes capris, skirts, dresses, jeans and dress shorts. Attire that will not be permitted includes tank tops or hats for gentleman, swimwear, cut offs or torn clothing. In addition, while T-shirts are allowed, T-shirts featuring offensive language and/or graphics are not.
  Cuisine: French
  Details: Disney Dining Plan Accepted

Item.Name: Rose & Crown Dining Room
Item.Content:
Rose & Crown Dining Room in World Showcase, Epcot, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Rose & Crown Dining Room

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90002084.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
This family-friendly British pub features traditional favorites, waterfront dining and lively evening entertainment.
WDWNT says...
You can't really go wrong with fish and chips or Shepherd's Pie, though it's fairly standard. I recommend going someplace a little more unique.
  Book Rose & Crown Dining Room Dining Reservations
  Cuisine: British
  Details: Disney Dining Plan Accepted

Item.Name: Rose & Crown Pub
Item.Content:
Rose & Crown Pub in World Showcase, Epcot, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Rose & Crown Pub

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90002086.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Take your taste buds across the pond to the liveliest of pubs! Practice your finest toast while you quench your thirst and quell your appetite with fresh pints, flavorful bites and classic British fare you won’t find elsewhere at Epcot.
  Cuisine: British

Item.Name: San Angel Inn Restaurante
Item.Content:
San Angel Inn Restaurante in World Showcase, Epcot, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for San Angel Inn Restaurante

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90002100.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Dine in perpetual twilight at this Mexican restaurant, modeled after a 17th-century hacienda at the base of Mayan ruins.
  Book San Angel Inn Restaurante Dining Reservations
  Cuisine: Mexican
  Details: Disney Dining Plan Accepted

WDWNT Reviews

Coming soon!

Item.Name: Tutto Gusto Wine Cellar
Item.Content:
Tutto Gusto Wine Cellar in World Showcase, Epcot, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Tutto Gusto Wine Cellar

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/16526362.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Experience the flavors of Italy at this cozy wine bar. Recalling an authentic Italian wine cellar, Tutto Gusto offers over 200 bottles of Italian wines—plus beer and a small-plates menu of meats, cheeses, panini, pasta and desserts.
  Cuisine: Italian

WDWNT Reviews

Coming soon!

Item.Content:
UK Beer Cart in World Showcase, Epcot, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for UK Beer Cart

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90002326.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Mosey across the pond as you make your way toward the United Kingdom Pavilion, where you can pick up a fresh pint served in its very own souvenir stein—discover this cart parked right outside the Rose and Crown Pub & Dining Room.
  Cuisine: British

Discover authentic Italian cooking, including hearty pastas, fresh salads and pizzas perfected in wood-burning ovens.
WDWNT says...
The best pizza at Disney World (and possibly in all of Florida) is served here. Start with the calamari; the spicy tomato sauce is perfection. You can't go wrong with any of the pizzas but pepperoni is my favorite. I know, it sounds boring, but it's so well done!
  Book Via Napoli Ristorante e Pizzeria Dining Reservations
  WDWNT recommends this!
  Cuisine: Italian
  Details: Disney Dining Plan Accepted

Item.Name: Yorkshire County Fish Shop
Item.Content:
Yorkshire County Fish Shop in World Showcase, Epcot, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Yorkshire County Fish Shop

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90002416.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Stop by for the finest British fare this side of the Pond. Savor strips of battered fish served with piping-hot chips. Plus, enjoy refreshing soft drinks and “draught” beer served in a souvenir glass—including Bass Ale and Harp Lager.
  Cuisine: American/British
  Details: Disney Dining Plan Accepted
